Instruction: Consider the controlled direct effect (CDE) of whether a person eats a healthy diet on whether a person has good cardiovascular health.
Question: Conditioned on whether a person exercises regularly being regular and whether a person maintains a healthy weight being overweight, if the whether a person eats a healthy diet had been healthy, would the whether a person has good cardiovascular health have been more likely to be good?

Background.data_info: For those with whether a person is exposed to a contagious disease being yes, whether the person seeks medical attention being no, whether the person shows symptoms of the disease being yes and whether the person receives appropriate treatment being no, the probability of whether the person recovers from the disease being yes is 0.2817.
